sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.synopsis: <!ELEMENT search_replace (file, find, replace)> <!ATTLIST configure base CDATA #IMPLIED>

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The search_replace element is one of the top-level operation elements. It is used to perform a search and replace operation of a file on a file's contents.
The file sub-element contains the filename.
The find sub-element contains the string to be searched.
The replace sub-element contains the replacement string.
The base attribute specifies the directory in which the file replacement occurs. See .

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.screen: echo Performing substitution in runit.sh cd /usr/src/mypackage cp runit.sh /tmp/foo.$$ sed -e 's/BINDIR/\/bin/' /tmp/foo.$$ > runit.sh
